descriptionHtml:
I've been always bothered that the Vampire Armor never had a helmet-like piece to go with it, so I decided to make this. This only acts as armor to complete the Vampire Armor set, it doesn't have anything else to it. Uses Serana's hood for the model
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Requires the Dawnguard DLC.
author: Rasorius
